title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Instructional Design for Technical University Language Curriculum Development and Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language education theory and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply 11 design considerations when designing language curricula tailored to technical colleges
Learners can collaboratively derive curriculum improvement plans through collective meaning-making activities
Learners can analyze the interconnectedness of curriculum elements using the Specialization dimension of Legitimation Code Theory
Learners can perform iterative design prototyping three or more times in an online real-time environment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
